If anyone's point total exceeds 21, he or she loses the game. 3. You can only choose one of the following two actions: {"Stand", "Hit"}. If you choose to Stand, you will stop taking cards and wait for the dealer to finish. If you choose to Hit, you can continue to take a card, but there is also the risk of losing the game over 21 points. 4. After all players have completed their hands, the dealer reveals their hidden card. Dealers must hit until their cards total 17 or higher.
